name: Null
baseCasting: No data
spellDescription: No description

name: Ether
baseCasting: Create a burst of magic flow
spellDescription: Create a tiny tear into the Ethereal Plane that deals 1d6 force damage

name: Object
baseCasting: Suffuse the nearest object or construct with Ether
spellDescription: Increase the durability of the nearest 1 by 1 by 1 foot object and render it unbreakable instantaneously

name: Life
baseDefinition: Essence that grants capacity for life
baseCasting: Create a transient life form
spellDescription: Create a 1 by 1 by 1 by 1 foot creature instantaneously of undetermined shape

name: Proliferation
baseCasting: Cause a small burst of the air the sigil is drawn in
spellDescription: Push all objects and creatures within a 1 by 1 by 1 foot space

name: Atrophy
baseCasting: Cause a small vacuum of the air the sigil is drawn in
spellDescription: Pull in objects and creatures within a 1 by 1 by 1 foot space

name: Division
baseCasting: Cause a small burst of heat in the air the sigil is drawn in
spellDescription: Create a 1 by 1 by 1 foot burst of heat that deals 1d6 fire damage

name: Light
baseCasting: Causes the air to become illuminated in a small space
spellDescription: Create a 1 by 1 by 1 foot burst of light

name: Space
baseCasting: Causes space to be distorted temporarily in a small space
spellDescription: Cause a distortion in space that warps attacks, roll 1d6, on a 1 the hit misses no matter what, and a 6 hits no matter what

name: Connection
baseCasting: Create a temporary link between yourself and the object or creature
spellDescription: Link yourself to the nearest creature, share damage and healing

name: Water
baseDefinition: That which makes up what we drink
baseCasting: Create a small amount of water
spellDescription: Create a 1 by 1 by 1 foot cube of water in the air, which immedietly falls to the ground

name: Earth
baseDefinition: That which makes up what we tread
baseCasting: Create a small amount of earth
spellDescription: Create a 1 by 1 by 1 foot cube of earth comprising local earth in the air, which immedietly falls to the ground

name: Fire
baseDefinition: That which makes up our heat
baseCasting: Create a small amount of fire
spellDescription: Create a 1 by 1 by 1 foot cube of fire in the air dealing 1d6 fire damage on a failed Dex save and dissapates

name: Air
baseDefinition: That which makes up what we breath
baseCasting: Create a small amount of air
spellDescription: Create a 1 by 1 by 1 foot cube of air, which is breathable and pushes out any gas or liquid in the space before dissipating normally

name: Animal
baseDefinition: Biological terrestrial creatures free of magic
baseCasting: Suffuse the nearest  terrestrial humanoid, beast, or monstrosity with Ether
spellDescription: Cause the nearest creature to become magical

name: Aquatic
baseDefinition: Biological marine creatures free of magic
baseCasting: Suffuse the nearest marine humanoid, beast, or monstrosity with Ether
spellDescription: Cause the nearest creature to become magical

name: Avian
baseDefinition: Biological aerial creatures free of magic
baseCasting: Suffuse the nearest aerial humanoid, beast, or monstrosity with Ether
spellDescription: Cause the nearest creature to become magical

name: Plant
baseCasting: Suffuse the nearest plant with Ether
spellDescription: Increase the growth of the nearest plant

name: Animate
baseDefinition: To bring inorganic substance to life
baseCasting: Causes the nearest object to begin moving
spellDescription: Cause the nearest object to move up to 1 foot

name: Health
baseCasting: Suffuse the nearest creature with increased health capacity
spellDescription: Increase the max HP of the nearest creature by 1

name: Motion
baseCasting: Increase movement speed
spellDescription: Increase the max movement speed of the nearest creature by 1

name: Erosion
baseCasting: Erode a small amount of earth
spellDescription: Break down a 1 by 1 by 1 foot cube of earth into its loosened constituents - revealing flaws in rock, reducing sandstone to sand, and packed dirt to loose

name: Cloud
baseDefinition: Those vapors which ride the winds
baseCasting: Create a small amount of cloud
spellDescription: Create a 1 by 1 by 1 foot cube of cool cloud vapor that can obscure vision and quench open nonmagical flames

name: Rain
baseDefinition: The gift of water from the heavens
baseCasting: Create a small amount of rain
spellDescription: Create a column of rain in a 1 by 1 by 1 foot space which falls promptly before dissapating

name: Mud
baseDefinition: The composite solution of soft earth
baseCasting: Create a small amount of mud
spellDescription: Transform a 1 by 1 by 1 foot cube of earth into mud which counts as difficult terrain, on initial movement into it they must succeed a Str save or lose all movement speed for their turn

name: Lava
baseDefinition: The molten blood of the earth
baseCasting: Create a small amount of lava
spellDescription: Transform a 1 by 1 by 1 foot cube of earth into lava which deals 2d6 fire damage on a failed Con save before returning to stone in an unoccupied space

name: Sand
baseCasting: Create a small amount of sand
spellDescription: Transform a 1 by 1 by 1 foot cube of stone into sand, not including dirt

name: Explosion
baseCasting: Create a small explosion
spellDescription: Create an explosion in a 1 by 1 by 1 foot cube space which deals 2d6 force damage on a failed Dex save before dissapating

name: Cinder
baseDefinition: That which is charred but cannot burn
baseCasting: Suffuse the nearest object to become heated
spellDescription: Causes the nearest 1 by 1 by 1 foot cube object to emit heat which deals 1d10 fire damage on a failed Con save. It can also boil water

name: Combustion
baseDefinition: That spark which leads to blaze
baseCasting: Causes the nearest object to alight
spellDescription: Causes the nearest 1 by 1 by 1 foot cube flammable object to catch alight

name: Ice
baseCasting: Suffuse the nearest object to become cold
spellDescription: Causes the nearest 1 by 1 by 1 foot object to begin freezing which deals 1d10 cold damage on a failed Con save. It can also cool an area and freeze water

name: Loess
baseDefinition: That earth which rides the winds
baseCasting: Causes nearby earth into the air
spellDescription: Create a 1 by 1 by 1 foot cloud of loose earth from the area that can obscure vision and which blinds anyone who fails a Dex save

name: Smoke
baseDefinition: Those remnants of flame which ride the winds
baseCasting: Create a small amount of smoke
spellDescription: Create a 1 by 1 by 1 foot plume of smoke that can obscure vision and which stuns a creature into a hacking cough on a failed Con save

name: Acceleration
baseCasting: Increase movement speed over time
spellDescription: Increase the max movement speed of the nearest creature by 1 every 10 rounds

name: Slow
baseCasting: Decrease movement speed
spellDescription: Decrease max movement speed of the nearest creature by 1

name: Nexus
baseCasting: Teleport between very specific distances
spellDescription: Teleport to a location 1 ft away in only cardinal directions

name: Teleport
baseDefinition: Dissociation from current location to nexus
baseCasting: Teleport freely within range
spellDescription: Teleport to a location 1 ft away
